What REAL Customers Are Saying…

Why Is aiwise Different?

Unlike many AI tools in the market today that simply regurgitates the same content generated by ChatGPT, we believe in crafting something distinctly superior.

aiwise advances the concept of AI-generated content by meticulously using sequential prompts to build comprehensive pieces, rich in depth and character. Our tool is capable of constructing content of over 3,000 words, adhering to Google’s guidelines for both informative and product review posts.

Every piece of content curated with aiwise is structured with the precision of SEO. We implement strategic H1, H2, and H3 titles and subtitles, complementing them with relevant, quality content. The result is a unique, fully optimized SEO-friendly text that stands tall in Google rankings.

But that’s not all. 

aiwise extends its efficiency into streamlining your workflow as well. With its additional features, you can connect your WordPress websites directly to our platform. This enables automatic syncing, posting, editing, and updating of all your content, and a whole lot more making content management as smooth as it can get.

Introducing aiwise

aiwise transforms AI content into Google-friendly, engaging content for your business needs. This AI-powered solution was designed specifically for affiliate and digital marketers! aiwise is a  revolutionary tool that offers a streamlined approach to generating top-tier, SEO-enriched content for your affiliate or informational websites.

Experience the magic of aiwise as it autonomously crafts compelling content, integrates media, and seamlessly incorporates affiliate links. It takes the labor out of your hands by automatically posting directly to your WordPress sites. Enhance your online presence with aiwise and stay ahead of the competition, effortlessly!

What Can aiwise Do?

aiwise is much more than just a content creator.  It’s offers a suite of features to help you automate your content creation and websites.  Let’s look at some of these features in detail.

Site Wizard

Streamline the creation of your new WordPress website, building out all your essential pages, categories, and even installing primary WordPress plugins. The true magic of SiteWizard lies in its personalization – each page it creates is intricately tailored to align with your website and niche.

Connect Sites

Integrate your WordPress websites directly with aiwise to enable automatic scheduling and content publishing. With our intuitive dashboard, edit your articles seamlessly, update them in real-time, and witness the changes go live on your site instantly.

Site Groups

Categorize your WordPress sites into organized groups, creating a simplified overview that is perfect for individual or client management. Execute targeted campaigns by posting exclusive content to your specifically selected SiteGroups. This feature is ideal for tailoring content to niche-specific sites or even PBN’s

Auto-Embed Media

Enhance your content like never before with our auto-embed feature. This tool empowers you to integrate relevant YouTube videos and images directly into your content. Not only does this make your posts more engaging for users, but it also boosts SEO optimization.

Content Customization

Our platform provides an array of customization options to shape your content exactly as you envision. Select the narrative perspective – such as first or second person. Dictate the tone of voice – from friendly to conversational or even angry. Choose the language in which your content will be created, and set your desired length – between 800 to 3,000 words.

GPT3.5 or GPT4

Choose between the capabilities of GPT3.5 or, if your OpenAI account is approved, the elevated power of GPT4. Unlike numerous AI tools that impose additional charges on top of your OpenAI costs, we champion transparency. With aiwise, you’re only liable for a flat monthly fee, granting you access to our array of premium features.

Content Scheduler

We’re taking automation to the next level. Our platform lets you schedule content creation and direct posting to your WordPress websites at intervals of your choice. But we don’t stop there. You can also schedule posts to multiple websites or predefined site groups simultaneously.

Content Editor

Want more control over your content before it goes live? We’ve got you covered. aiwise boasts a fully-equipped editor integrated directly into your dashboard. Fine-tune your articles to perfection, then effortlessly publish to any of your connected WordPress websites.

Update and Sync

Say goodbye to the hassle of logging into multiple websites for content edits and updates. With aiwise, manage your content effortlessly from a single unified dashboard. Simply make your edits, click “Update”, and let aiwise work its magic – updating and synchronizing your existing posts across all platforms.

Article Management

Simplify your content management with aiwise. Our intuitive dashboard offers a comprehensive overview, allowing you to easily view and manage all your created content in one centralized location.  

Share Articles

With aiwise, sharing draft articles with your clients or customers is a breeze. A simple click on ‘Share’ generates a unique link to your content on a non-branded page, enabling seamless reviews before going live.

Download Articles

Take advantage of aiwise’s download feature, offering you the freedom to download your articles as TXT files in HTML format. Use them for yourself, sell them, or even package them up and sell them as a PLR product.

Multi-Language

Output your content to many different supported languages.  See the full list here.

Internal Linking

Boost your sites authority and rankings by automatically linking out to existing posts on your WordPress site.

YouTube Posts

Create articles or even entire websites from YouTube video channels, playlists, keywords, or URL’s.  An easy way to build a niches site fast!

RSS Feed Posts

With the RSS post type option, you can use RSS feeds to generate unique articles and post to your website.  AIWM will even continue to watch for new content on these feeds!

Custom Images/Links

Use your own anchor text or banner/images when creating affiliate links.  AIWM will automatically attach your affiliate link to each one when creating the articles.

aiwise Demo

Amazon Product Review Articles:

Generate product reviews for any Amazon product or enter a Amazon search URL and let aiwise do reviews on ALL the products for several pages deep!  A true “set and forget” system.

Informational Articles:

Build authority to your website by creating informational type posts on any topic.  Paste in a list of keywords, questions, or topics and let aiwise do all the work for you!

Any Product Reviews:

Enter a URL for any product from any affiliate network and aiwise will take the current product data and write an engaging, informative and Google friendly product review.

Roundup Product Reviews:

Enter 3 links to 3 different products and aiwise will build out an engaging article that summarizes each product with a comparison and your affiliate links.

YouTube Videos:

Enter a URL to any YouTube video and aiwise will take the transcript and convert it into an engaging informational article or product review!

Adsense Approved Sites!

Although we can’t guarantee 100% you’re website will be approved for Adsense, many users of AIWM have multiple websites approved without any issues!

Extensive Training Tutorials

Never get lost.  We provide step-by-step training in full 4K so you see every step of each process.  We will continue to expand on these tutorials as new features and options are added.

FAQ’s

Does the content pass AI detection?

The truth is, while AI detection exists, it isn’t the sole or primary factor that Google uses to rank content. In fact, Google’s primary focus is on the value that the content brings to users. They’ve specifically mentioned in their article here that they will rank AI-generated content as long as it provides valuable, accurate, and useful information to users. Hence, whether content was generated by AI or a human doesn’t matter as much as the quality of the content itself.

As for SEO optimization, aiwise uses the latest SEO best practices, along with an understanding of the topic and target audience, to generate high-quality content. This includes relevant header tags, meta descriptions, and maintaining a coherent and readable structure throughout the text. The idea is to create content that not only appeals to search engines but also is meaningful and engaging for the reader.

I’d also like to share with you that Google is venturing into creating its own AI tool to write news articles. This further emphasizes the fact that AI-generated content is becoming a crucial part of the digital landscape.

In conclusion, what matters most is the value and quality of the content rather than whether it’s AI-generated or not. With aiwise, our goal is to provide you with content that adheres to these principles.

Is the content plagarism free?

If using Originality to check for plagarism, the articles contain 2%-10% on average.

Does it only work with WordPress?

Currently, it only syncs with WordPress.  You can still use the platform to create all your content and even edit it within the dashboard.  But to post to other platforms, you would need to copy/paste the content.

Will I be able to upgrade or downgrade later?

Yes, you pay per month.  You can cancel your subscription at any time and renew on a different plan at any time.

Why do I have to pay for your platform and OpenAI also?

You need to pay for both aiwise and OpenAI because they serve two unique but complimentary roles in content creation and marketing optimization.

OpenAI is a powerful tool that generates content based on specific prompts, but on its own, it doesn’t have the additional, specially designed features that aiwise offers.

aiwise is our proprietary platform that takes OpenAI’s capabilities and expands on them significantly. We use OpenAI as a foundation and then layer on our own innovative features to bring you a robust and sophisticated tool for your online marketing needs.

By using aiwise, you have more options to create high-quality SEO optimized content, not only for product reviews but also for a variety of informational type posts. Our platform allows you to connect unlimited websites for autoposting, edit content seamlessly, share content easily, and even auto-generate product reviews of Amazon products. These features go beyond the capabilities of OpenAI, giving you a more comprehensive tool for your marketing strategies.

In order to provide these advanced features, maintain our servers, pay for the proxies we use, and continually upgrade our services for your benefit, we charge a monthly fee for aiwise. This cost is separate from OpenAI as it goes directly towards improving and maintaining our unique platform.

Moreover, aiwise employs a series of custom prompts, which are fused together in a sequence to create more in-depth content, a capability you would not have with OpenAI alone. This results in a more effective and detailed content creation process, significantly enhancing your marketing efforts.

So, while OpenAI provides a solid base for content creation, the value of aiwise lies in the extra layer of capabilities we offer that not only improve the quality of your content but also make the whole process more efficient and streamlined for you.

Do I need to use my own OpenAI API key?

Yes.  Unlike many other apps that actually charge you an upsell on top of OpenAI’s fees, we do not.  We only charge a flat monthly fee to use our platform.  Then you pay your own OpenAI fees which typically cost between 0.01-0.05 per article if you’re using GPT3.5.  Using GPT4 is much more expensive.

Do the unused posts roll over each month?

No. Every 30 days your post count will reset and you will be allowed to create as many as your plan allows.  All the article will remain in your dashboard unless you choose to delete them.

Can I use this for clients?

Absolutely.  You can even add their websites into your dashboard.  You can create as many articles every month as your plan permits.

What about image usage rights?

Some affiliate websites allow you to use their images from their websites. If that’s the case, you can choose to embed the images for those articles you create as you’re setting up your campaign.  Otherwise, you can disable the “embed images” and add your own.  Otherwise, you can choose to not embed any images and manually add them yourself.

Will aiwise work with existing websites?

Absolutely.  Just connect it, set up your campaigns and let it start posting 🙂

How long are the articles?

You can choose between:

  • short ~800 words
  • medium ~1,500 words
  • long ~3,000 words


But it can vary.  For an 800 word article, you may get a 1,200 word article.  For a 3,000 word article, you may get a 4,000 word article.
